programme.title: S/Lge SF: Hull KR v St Helens
programme.desc: Advancing from an unforgettable Eliminator victory, St Helens are a win away from a first Old Trafford appearance since 2022 as league leaders Hull KR stand in the way of the Red V.

programme.title: Super League Grand Final
programme.desc: Facing off for the second successive season, Hull KR and Wigan Warriors clash in the Super League Grand Final. The Warriors capped off their second-ever quadruple in this fixture last year.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Reading/WHU '07
programme.desc: Reading: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Reading, the 6-0 hammering of West Ham at the Madejski Stadium in 2007.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Sheff Utd/Arsenal 2006
programme.desc: Sheff Utd: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Sheffield United, the 1-0 win over Arsenal at Bramall Lane in December 2006.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Sheff Weds/Man U 1998
programme.desc: Sheff Wed: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Sheffield Wednesday, the 3-1 win over Man Utd back in November 1998.

programme.title: The Greatest Leg - 2023 Final
programme.desc: In 2023, both MVG and Michael Smith were on course to record a nine-dart leg; the Dutchman fell short by a single dart, but the Englishman achieved perfection. Ep 10.

programme.title: 30 Years of the PDC World Champs'
programme.desc: In celebration of 30 years of the PDC World Darts Championship, take a look back at the very first tournament, a classic final from 2007 and one of the greatest legs ever played. Ep 1.

programme.title: The Taylor Years
programme.desc: Hear from the legendary Phil Taylor as the 16-time world champion recounts his glory years at the PDC World Darts Championship. Ep 2.

programme.title: The Greatest Final 07:Taylor v RVB
programme.desc: In the final act at the Circus Tavern, two of the finest players to have ever played the sport created a match for the ages, as Phil Taylor and Raymond van Barneveld met in the final. Ep 3.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Aston Villa v N. Forest
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Aston Villa host Nottingham Forest at Villa Park in an enthralling, end-to-end encounter that saw 10 goals.

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Aston Villa v Leeds Utd
programme.desc: In the dying embers of an 2018-19 Sky Bet Championship clash at Villa Park, Kemar Roofe's last-gasp goal sealed a famous Leeds comeback having trailed 2-0 to Aston Villa.

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Aston Villa v Sheff Utd
programme.desc: In 2019 at Villa Park, Tyrone Mings, Tammy Abraham and Andre Green saved Villa's blushes, scoring three goals in the final 10 minutes to steal a point from the visiting Sheffield United.

programme.title: EFL 18/19:Leeds Utd v Derby County
programme.desc: Frank Lampard's Derby go to Elland Road for the second leg of their 2018-19 Sky Bet Championship play-off semi-final with Marcelo Bielsa's Leeds, with the odds stacked against them.

programme.title: Nick Dougherty's Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: As winter takes its grip, hear from former professional Nick Dougherty as he shares his Tee Time Tips to help you improve your game out on the golf course.

programme.title: Best of The OpenZone 2024
programme.desc: A look at the best moments from The Open Zone during 2024.

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Charlton v Doncaster
programme.desc: Two matches of Sky Bet League 1 semi-final play-off action couldn't separate Charlton Athletic and Doncaster Rovers in 2019, as a date at Wembley hinged on a dramatic penalty shootout.

programme.title: EFL 21/22: Coventry City v Fulham
programme.desc: In October 2021, Coventry took Fulham to the sword, putting four past the travelling west Londoners who eventually went on to secure Premier League promotion.

programme.title: EFL 21/22: Blackburn v Fulham
programme.desc: In a Sky Bet Championship encounter to remember for the visitors - and one to forget for the hosts - the travelling Fulham put seven unanswered goals past a hapless Blackburn at Ewood Park.

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Memories: 1999
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic play-off final from the English Football League. Here, rewind to 1999 and a memorable encounter between Gillingham and Manchester City.

programme.desc: Pygmoelian: After he's snubbed for a Duff beer calendar, Moe goes for plastic surgery and ends up so handsome that he becomes a soap star.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart to the Future: Bart foresees his adult future as a struggling rock guitarist crashing on Ralph Wiggum's couch, while Lisa becomes President.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Indecision Amalgamation: Raj has a dating dilemma. Penny can't decide whether to accept a role in a terrible film. Sheldon chooses between two gaming systems.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Relationship Diremption: Sheldon wonders whether he's wasting his time with his study of string theory. Raj and Emily go on a double date with Howard and Bernadette.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Virgin Territory: It's a day of disturbing realisations when Mitchell manages to ruin one of Jay's proudest golf moments. Gloria stumbles upon Claire's dangerous little secret.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Leap Day: Cameron's birthday falls on 29 February, and with the celebrations coming but once every four years, there's loads of pressure on Mitchell to get it right.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Veracity Elasticity: Leonard is upset when he finds out that Penny has been moving his collectables out of Sheldon's old room and into storage behind his back.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Brain Bowl Incubation: Sheldon tries to convince Amy that they should procreate. Raj feels embarrassed about what the new woman in his life does for a living.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Geology Elevation: Sheldon can't contain his jealousy when he hears that his university colleague, Bert the geologist, has won a prestigious fellowship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Property Division Collision: Sheldon, Amy, Leonard and Penny attempt to divide up all their possessions. It doesn't go well.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Therapist: Boyle and Peralta investigate when a psychiatrist reports one of his patients missing. Captain Holt wants to meet Diaz's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Casecation: Peralta and Santiago celebrate their wedding anniversary while standing guard over a comatose drugs baron who was shot and rushed into hospital.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Gone Boy: Bart falls into an old top-secret underground military installation in the woods.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Frink Gets Testy: When Mr Burns panics about the apocalypse and builds a cosmic ark, Professor Frink develops a test to work out who deserves a place on it.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: It's another dinner party and It. Is. Serving! Progress is on the menu for some but one couple's authenticity is called into question. Did anyone order tension?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Relaxation Integration: Amy tries to convince Sheldon that he has a more laid-back side. Raj and Stuart compete to woo Bernadette's new colleague Ruchi.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Explosion Implosion: Howard and Sheldon bond on a trip to the desert to launch a model rocket. Leonard is annoyed when his mother befriends Penny.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart After Dark: Bart gets a job at a burlesque theatre. Several residents are keen customers, but others aren't happy to have the showgirls peddling their wares in Springfield.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpsoncalifragilisticexpiala (Annoyed Grunt) cious: Supernanny Shary Bobbins comes to the rescue of Marge, who is so stressed that her hair has started to fall out.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The wedding may be over - but the fallout's only just begun. As Tony faces an impossible choice, a life hangs in the balance. And with devastating news spreading, the village is in pieces.

programme.title: Hollyoaks at 30: Most Explosive...
programme.desc: ...Episodes: Another classic episode. Everyone shelters in The Dog as the violent storm rages outside. But Lily sneaks out into the tempest to check on Romeo when Prince is distracted.

programme.title: Supercruising: Life at Sea
programme.desc: The crew sailing North Africa and Europe put on an orange party complete with dazzling costumes and a deck-stomping parade, while Caribbean cruisers enjoy a bubbling volcano mud bath. (Ep2)

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: At another emotionally charged Commitment Ceremony, one couple affirm their love, a bride's behaviour is called out and there's solo sofa surfing... again.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Hannah and Lee both love festivals; will they make sweet music? Mary from Liverpool is looking for a 'straight Paul O'Grady'. And 'edgy librarian' Olivia is on her first ever date.

programme.title: Naked Attraction's Best Naughty...
programme.desc: ...Bits: We celebrate Naked Attraction's biggest and best audacious, attention-grabbing characters, from 75-year-old bisexual Ian to Shaida, who was looking for the dad of her future kids.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: At another emotionally charged Commitment Ceremony, one couple affirm their love, a bride's behaviour is called out and there's solo sofa surfing... again.

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: All Work and No Rosé: A primary charter guest gets an unpleasant surprise that threatens to ruin the entire trip. Danni's sent on a difficult mission.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror VII: Bart finds his evil twin in the attic, Lisa becomes God to a race of tiny people, and Kang and Kodos assume the identities of Bill Clinton and Bob Dole.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Collaboration Contamination: Sheldon and Raj ask Bernadette for advice about their jealousy when Amy and Howard decide to collaborate on a new project.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Proton Regeneration: Sheldon goes head-to-head with Wil Wheaton as they compete for the role of the new Professor Proton when the TV series has a reboot.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Sex, Lies, and Kickball: Jay's best friend, Shorty, returns from Costa Rica and stays at the house so that they can reconnect. And Alex is ready to shed her good-girl image.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to Malcolm's Job: Tina agrees to give Grover piano lessons, and her son Malcolm lands a job in retail.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Big Payback: When Gemma has her car repaired at Calvin's garage, Tina insists that she doesn't need to pay for it - much to Calvin's consternation.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Mike and Nellie's: In Oakhurst, Gordon Ramsay helps the overwhelmed owner of Mike and Nellie's restaurant, who lost his way when his father and business partner died.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: As Hollyoaks enters its 30th birthday week, longest-serving resident Tony prepares to marry Diane. But secrets threaten to turn his dream day into one nobody will ever forget...

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The wedding may be over - but the fallout's only just begun. As Tony faces an impossible choice, a life hangs in the balance. And with devastating news spreading, the village is in pieces.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: El Greco: Gordon Ramsay visits struggling Greek restaurant El Greco, where the owners have secretly recruited 'Chef Mike' the microwave to help them out on a daily basis.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: At another emotionally charged Commitment Ceremony, one couple affirm their love, a bride's behaviour is called out and there's solo sofa surfing... again.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Days of Wine and D'Oh'ses: After forgetting his birthday party, Barney quits drinking and takes helicopter flying lessons.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Kill the Alligator and Run: Homer thinks he only has four years to live. So he takes the family on holiday to Florida, but does something foolish and gets into big trouble...

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Anything Can Happen Recurrence: Penny and Leonard distract Sheldon from his career problems by reinstating Anything Can Happen Thursday. Raj asks for Howard's advice.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Proton Transmogrification: Sheldon struggles to process his feelings of grief when his idol Professor Proton passes away. The gang gather to celebrate Star Wars Day.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Send Out the Clowns: The funeral service for a beloved clown mentor reunites Cameron with his estranged ex-clown partner, Lewis. And Manny has a cool new friend.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Leap Day: Cameron's birthday falls on 29 February, and with the celebrations coming but once every four years, there's loads of pressure on Mitchell to get it right.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Birthday Synchronicity: Sheldon and Amy try to celebrate her birthday with an intimate night at home but are interrupted when Bernadette goes into labour.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Holiday Summation: After spending Christmas apart, the gang gather at Penny and Leonard's flat and hear about Sheldon and Amy's terrible trip to Texas.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Romance Recalibration: Penny thinks that Leonard has stopped making an effort in their relationship, so she decides to go away for a spa weekend with Amy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Emotion Detection Automation: Sheldon tests a new invention after hearing that it could help him to read people's emotions. Raj seeks dating advice.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Bimbo: Holt and Peralta investigate when valuable antique coins are stolen from the university where Kevin works. Jeffords and Santiago get competitive.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Ticking Clocks: Peralta and the squad track down a hacker who infiltrates the precinct's servers, compromising protected information on undercover agents.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer Is Where the Art Isn't: Homer learns to love a Miro painting. Then it's stolen - and he gets the blame.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: King Leer: Moe inherits a mattress business from his father, then lands in an all-out war with his siblings.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: At another emotionally charged Commitment Ceremony, one couple affirm their love, a bride's behaviour is called out and there's solo sofa surfing... again.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: More clips from Rude Tube's naughty little sister, including a zombie prank, cats singing the Star Wars theme, a hilarious pee prank and an escaped honey badger.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Tesla Recoil: Leonard and Howard learn that Sheldon went to work with the military behind their backs. Bernadette thinks Ruchi's trying to steal her job.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Mook, the Chef, the Wife and Her Homer: Homer becomes the boss of Fat Tony's mob when Tony's son decides to become a chef rather than go into the family business.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Jazzy and the Pussycats: Bart takes up playing the drums, upstages Lisa and joins a top jazz band. So Lisa turns her back on music and starts rescuing animals instead.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: After Clare's deadly scheme, a resident's hunt for answers takes them to Brookside Close, where they're met by someone who's not afraid to speak her mind: Sheila Grant.

programme.title: New: Hollyoaks Unwrapped
programme.desc: Brand new series: Expect set secrets, gossip, interviews and more, as Kieron Richardson unwraps the world of Hollyoaks, with fellow cast members past and present, friends and fans. (Ep4)

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: It's rural retreat time, and a welcome romantic break for some. But rumours about a bride's behaviour spiral, and another bride learns a heartbreaking truth.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's sharpest armchair critics have been watching The Masked Singer, Trigger Point, Pam & Tommy, First Dates: Valentine's, Mary Beard's Forgotten Art, and Dragons' Den.

programme.title: New: Hollyoaks Later
programme.desc: Brand new: Hollyoaks Later collides with Brookside as residents escape the Close for Liverpool's luxury suburbs, where old secrets ignite new betrayals when a party turns deadly.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly-tinged but ultimately feel-good comedy starring Tom Hanks as a grumpy misanthrope who spends his time badgering people into following society's rules. But why is he like this?

programme.title: Military Wives
programme.desc: (2019) Comedy drama starring Sharon Horgan and Kristin Scott Thomas. A group of military wives overcome their personal differences to form an unforgettable choir.

programme.title: The Future
programme.desc: (2011) Existentialist comedy-drama. Miranda July and Hamish Linklater play a couple whose directionless lives take an unexpected turn when they adopt a cat. Sex/strong language.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Sign2Win
programme.desc: Five daunting games and only one winning team... Will it be close friends Steve and Joe; Moona and Stephen or Amy and her father Rodney taking home £1,000?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: (1959) Western. Randolph Scott plays a bounty hunter who has unfinished business with the brother of his latest target. But his quest for revenge looks like it could be undermined.

programme.title: They Rode West
programme.desc: (1954) Tough western. A cavalry doctor (Robert Francis) discovers a Native American tribe is dying of malaria, but his by-the-book captain (Phil Carey) refuses to allow their treatment.

programme.title: Yesterday's Enemy
programme.desc: (1959) Wartime drama with Stanley Baker. The captain of a British army patrol deciphers secret enemy battle plans, but does so at a great moral cost.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: (1993) Romantic comedy with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan. A bereaved man gets another chance at love when his son puts him on a radio talk show.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: (2022) Romcom with Julia Roberts and George Clooney. A staggeringly beautiful, divorced couple reunite to stop their daughter's wedding in the staggeringly beautiful surroundings of Bali.

programme.title: Baby Ruby
programme.desc: (2022) Psychological thriller with Noémie Merlant and Kit Harrington. When successful lifestyle blogger Jo gives birth to baby Ruby, her life takes a less than picture-perfect turn...

programme.title: The Winter Guest
programme.desc: (1997) Alan Rickman's assured directorial debut, starring Emma Thompson, set in a bleak Scottish fishing village where four different couples' relationships are observed. Strong language.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Hangman's Knot
programme.desc: (1952) Civil War-era Western. A unit of Confederate soldiers attack a Union troop to steal gold. Learning that the war is over, they must finish the mission in disguise.

programme.title: The Iron Petticoat
programme.desc: (1956) Comedy with Katharine Hepburn and Bob Hope. A Russian captain defects to London, falls for the charms of Major Lockwood, and tries to convince him of the beauty of communism.

programme.title: Hell Is a City
programme.desc: (1960) Classic crime thriller with Stanley Baker and Billie Whitelaw. A world-weary detective with a messy private life tracks a violent thief through the streets of Manchester.

programme.title: Robin and Marian
programme.desc: (1976) Touching romance starring Sean Connery and Audrey Hepburn. The ageing legend Robin Hood returns to Sherwood Forest and discovers that, while he was away, Marian has become an Abbess.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: (1998) Elijah Wood and Morgan Freeman star in the sci-fi disaster movie about impending meteorite-related disaster, attempts to destroy it, and possibly some cataclysmic havoc.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: (1999) Drama with Tom Hanks and Michael Clarke Duncan. Strange events occur when a man convicted of raping and murdering two young girls arrives on death row in a Louisiana prison.

programme.title: Open Range
programme.desc: (2003) Kevin Costner's western with Robert Duvall and Michael Gambon. A small band of free grazers are forced to take on a local rancher and his hired thugs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Storm over the Nile
programme.desc: (1955) Drama. Anthony Steel stars as a disgraced soldier who, during the British army's 1898 campaign in Sudan, goes way beyond the call of duty to prove his courage. With Laurence Harvey.

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: (1952) Drama starring Ralph Richardson as a pioneering aviator determined to break the sound barrier, even if it means risking the lives of those closest to him. Directed by David Lean.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: (2015) Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance star in Steven Spielberg's Cold War spy drama. After gaining notoriety for defending a Soviet spy, a US lawyer then tries to free a CIA pilot.

programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: (2022) Leaving from Platform 4 - a high octane, Shinkansen-set comedy thriller with Brad Pitt, Joey King and Michael Shannon. A jaded assassin does one last job on a villain-packed train.

programme.title: We're All Going to the World's...
programme.desc: ...Fair: (2021) Jane Schoenbrun's creepy, freaky, coming-of-age horror starring Anna Cobb. A lonely teenage girl gets increasingly sucked into the unnerving nether-world of an online game.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly-tinged but ultimately feel-good comedy starring Tom Hanks as a grumpy misanthrope who spends his time badgering people into following society's rules. But why is he like this?

programme.desc: (2019) Comedy drama starring Sharon Horgan and Kristin Scott Thomas. A group of military wives overcome their personal differences to form an unforgettable choir.

programme.title: The Future
programme.desc: (2011) Existentialist comedy-drama. Miranda July and Hamish Linklater play a couple whose directionless lives take an unexpected turn when they adopt a cat. Sex/strong language.

programme.title: Alex Armstrong Tonight
programme.desc: Join Alex for two hours of lively debate and news making interviews. Top guests tackle the big issues of the day with Alex's fresh take on every story.

programme.title: Alex Armstrong Tonight Late Edition
